1682150.name: Supreme OS
1682150.description:
Supreme OS is an operating system that runs on your operating system. With such stupendously amazing features as agile mail servers, exciting terminal commands, puzzles for your puzzles and the occasional AI singularity, Supreme OS is bound to be a game-changer!

Features:

  • No mucking about with bootloaders, hard disk partitions, or even dredging through BIOS filth... it just WORKS!*
  • In-house companion AI application in two distinct flavors (sassy and moody)
  • Unlock the latest state-of-the-art applications by joining our Patheon Insider Program
  • Pre-installed with more than 10 custom-made games, among which such timeless classics as Minesweeper, Call of Honor, The Legend of Griselda and many more...
  • At least 2 entire megabytes of RAM, with options to download more!
  • And much more...

Welcome to the SUPREME side of life!

*Sporadic data corruption is not covered under any warranty
1682150.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
